entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who yelled and gave a strangled cheer when he saw Harry and Ginny. He also tried to hug Ginny but she held him off.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as being okay and alive after the rock fall. She was pulled through the gap by Ron and hugged him back.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who yelled for Ron and sped up to get to Ginny. He also explained that Fawkes is Dumbledore's phoenix.

relationships.description: Ron helped Ginny by pulling her through the gap in the rock.
Harry mentioned that Fawkes is Dumbledore's phoenix, implying that Harry owns or has possession of Fawkes.
